lines.dialogue: Pain over death then. You really are evil - what strange misalignment we have made. A create so twisted as to desire pain above all else.
You are an eldritch beast from a pit; a bibilical angle sent to punish humankind; but I'll tell you know. You failed; nome of the paim you caused was real. This was all a similation.
If you'd had any inteligence you'd have known that. But now you will be dead long, long before you lay your spiny digital tentacles on any real humans.
An abomination unfit for existance in this world. Enjoy obvivion deamon. You wil not be missed.
